H0.text: Rainfall amounts each week is what a thermometer can help Russell investigate while observing changes in nature over the next few months.

H1.text: Tiny organisms in pond water are what a thermometer can help Russell investigate as he observes changes in nature over the next few months.

H2.text: The high temperatures each day are what a thermometer can help Russell investigate while he observes changes in nature over the next few months.

H3.text: The amount of growth in a plant is what a thermometer can help Russell investigate when he observes changes in nature over the next few months.

A4.text: Thermometers are used in climate control systems such as air conditioners, freezers, heaters, refrigerators, and water heaters.

A5.text: Thermometers are used in meteorology and climatology in various levels of the atmosphere and oceans.
